author: Content_DeletERROR
comment: I’m not sure so take mine with a grain of salt but your MC would overwrite your attendance

author: Melodic_Cap_2280
comment: it will say u are on mc. if u haven’t submitted ur mc, instead of putting the whole duration of the mc (which is 2 days), u can just apply it for 1 day. this way ur mc won’t overwrite ur attendance if u were to attend class tmr
analysis:
```json
{
  "sentiment": "positive",
  "topics": ["administration", "attendance"],
  "complaints": [],
  "suggestions": ["Apply MC for 1 day at a time to avoid overwriting attendance if returning to class the next day."]
}
```
